name: DouDas Danger
description:
Doudas Danger 2D adventure about a village guy, an unusual platformer will throw you into the thick of hot skirmishes in the depths of a magical forest! The undead, slugs and mimics rebelled and stole all the treasures of the forest - your task is to return them. Can you complete this mission? Keep in mind that hordes of enemies and dangerous traps will interfere with you, and only dexterous and attentive players will be able to get to the very end.

Peculiarities:
- Nice graphics by IoIoF
- Nice soundtrack loloF
- unforgettable adventure
